name: desktop-dimmer
description: Enables darker-than-dark Desktop dimming for your displays.

packageJSON.name: desktop-dimmer
packageJSON.description: Enables darker-than-dark Desktop dimming for your displays

releases.name: Desktop Dimmer v2.2.0
releases.body:
### 🍾 Features
- Adds ``AppImage`` package format
- Adds ``pacman`` package (Arch Linux)
- Adds ``rpm`` package format (Red Hat Linux)

### 🚨Bugfixes
- Fixes cross-platform image asset lookup

### 🔧 Internals
- Electron 1.4.15
- Dependencies upgrade

releases.name: Desktop Dimmer v2.0.0
releases.body:
### 🍾 Features
- Autostart and preferences

### 🚨 Fixes
-  In-app updates 

### 🔧 Internals
- Improved logging
- Dependencies upgraded

releases.name: Desktop Dimmer v1.9.92
releases.body:
### 🚨 Fixes
- Screen config change crash

### 🔧 Internals
- Electron 1.4.14

releases.name: Desktop Dimmer v1.9.91
releases.body:
### 🍾 Features
- Automatic in-app updates (macOS)
- User interface optimizations
- Adapt to resolution and workspace changes
- Handling connecting and removing screens

### 🚨 Fixes
- Run as CLI module

### 🔧 Internals
- Size optimisation (25%)
- Electron 1.4.13
- Dependencies upgrade
- Buildsystem upgrade
